snippet: The operation was part of a series of raids across France stemming from the investigation into a grenade attack last month on a Jewish market near Paris, police and judiciary officials said.
abstract: French police officers fatally shoot Jeremie Louis-Sidney during one of series of antiterrorism raids across France stemming from investigation into September grenade attack on Jewish market near Paris.
lead_paragraph: The operation was part of a series of raids across France stemming from the investigation into a grenade attack last month on a Jewish market near Paris, police and judiciary officials said.

headline.seo: French Police Kill a Man During Antiterrorism Raid
headline.main: Man Killed by French Police During an Antiterrorism Raid
headline.print_headline: Man Killed by French Police During an Antiterrorism Raid
